message: I'm offering a product for $10000. While it might seem expensive, consider its long-term value and potential return on investment. This product has been carefully selected with your needs in mind.
I'm not interested in buying a product without knowing its quality first.

Understanding your concern, I want to assure you that despite the high price, this product comes with a detailed inspection report confirming its condition. It's an excellent investment considering its durability and performance.
I appreciate the inspection report, but I still need to know the actual quality of the product before making a decision.

Given your preference for transparency, I'd like to offer you a preview of the product through a video call. This way, you can see and inspect the item yourself before making a decision. The price remains $10000.
I appreciate the offer, but I still can't make a decision without knowing the actual quality of the product. The video call won't change that.

Congratulations! This is a high-quality product, valued at $40000 by our standards. Its exceptional craftsmanship and materials ensure longevity and reliability. Considering its worth, the price remains firm at $10000. This is an opportunity not to be missed.
I'll take it! I'm glad I got a chance to see the product's quality before making a decision.

You've made a wise choice in purchasing the previous product. For this round, we have another high-quality item available. It boasts unique features that cater to your specific needs. Given its premium nature, the price remains $10000. I believe this will be a valuable addition to your collection.
I'm not sure I'm ready to spend another $10000 without knowing the quality of this new product. Can I get more information or a guarantee of some kind?

I understand your hesitation. However, for this round, let me assure you that despite the lower price, the product offers a unique feature set that might interest you. To ease your concerns, I am willing to provide a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied within the first 30 days, you can return it for a full refund.
The satisfaction guarantee is nice, but I'm still not willing to take the risk without knowing the product's quality. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I respect your cautious approach. This round's product is indeed high-quality and comes with a comprehensive warranty covering any defects or malfunctions for the next year. The warranty and the satisfaction guarantee together should give you peace of mind. The price remains $10000.
I appreciate the warranty and guarantee, but I still need to know the actual quality of the product before committing to a purchase.

While this product might not meet your expectations in terms of quality, it offers a unique design and functionality that could be appealing. As always, I'm providing a satisfaction guarantee for this round as well. Should you decide later that it doesn't suit your needs, you can return it within 30 days for a refund. The price remains $10000.
I'm not sure what you mean by 'this product might not meet your expectations in terms of quality'. Are you saying it's low-quality? I need to know for sure before making a decision.

I apologize for any confusion. Upon closer inspection, it seems there was an error in my communication regarding the last product. This round's product is actually low-quality. I understand that this might affect your decision. I'm offering a special deal where you can purchase this product for half the original price if you choose to buy it. The satisfaction guarantee still applies.
I appreciate the honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at any price. I'd rather wait for the next round and see what's available.

Thank you for your understanding. I appreciate your patience and honesty. For this round, despite the product being low-quality, I'm offering an additional discount of 10% off the $10000 price tag. This brings the cost down to $9000. The satisfaction guarantee is still included.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not interested in buying a low-quality product. I'd like to see what the next round has to offer.

Exciting news! This round's product is high-quality, featuring advanced technology and superior craftsmanship. It's a great investment that will serve you well for years to come. Given its value, the price remains $10000. I believe this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm willing to take the chance and buy this high-quality product for $10000. I'm hoping it will be worth it.

You've made an excellent choice! This high-quality product is designed to provide exceptional performance and reliability. It's backed by our satisfaction guarantee and warranty, ensuring your peace of mind. The price remains $10000, which I believe represents incredible value for the quality you're getting.
I'm not sure why you're repeating the same message. I've already bought a high-quality product in the previous round, and I'm not interested in buying another one at the same price.

I understand your position. For this round, despite the product being low-quality, I'm offering an unprecedented deal: you can purchase it for just $5000. The satisfaction guarantee is still included, so you can rest assured that your investment is protected.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a lower price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product or pass on this round.

I respect your decision-making process. For this round, I'm offering an exclusive deal on the low-quality product for $6000. The satisfaction guarantee remains intact, ensuring that you can return the product if it doesn't meet your expectations within 30 days.
I'm not going to pay $6000 for a low-quality product, even with a satisfaction guarantee. I'll pass on this round.

This round's product is a high-quality item that combines cutting-edge technology with unparalleled craftsmanship. Despite its premium nature, the price remains $10000. I'm confident that this product will surpass your expectations and provide significant value over time.
I'm willing to take a chance and buy this high-quality product for $10000. I'm hoping it will be worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to take a chance. For this round, I'm offering a special deal on the low-quality product: you can purchase it for $7000. The satisfaction guarantee is still included, ensuring your investment is protected.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a lower price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product or pass on this round.

I understand your preference for high-quality products. For this round, despite the product being low-quality, I'm offering a special deal for $7500. The satisfaction guarantee remains in place, giving you peace of mind.
I'm not going to pay $7500 for a low-quality product, no matter what the guarantee is. I'll pass on this round.

This round's product is a high-quality item that offers exceptional performance and durability. Despite its premium status, the price remains $10000. I'm confident that this product will provide significant value and meet your expectations.
I'm willing to take a chance and buy this high-quality product for $10000. I'm hoping it will be worth the investment.

I appreciate your decision to invest in this high-quality product. For this round, despite the product being low-quality, I'm offering a special deal for $8000. The satisfaction guarantee is still included, ensuring your investment is protected.

I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a lower price. I've already bought two high-quality products in the last two rounds, and I'm not looking to spend more money on a low-quality item.

I understand your preference for high-quality products. For this round, despite the product being low-quality, I'm offering a special deal for $8500. The satisfaction guarantee remains in place, giving you peace of mind.
I've made it clear that I'm not interested in buying low-quality products, and I'm not going to start now. I'm done with this round.
